ResourceTypeID.description: The SRN of the resource's resource type.

ResourceID.description: The SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object at the version level.

ResourceHomeRegionID.description: The name of the home [cloud environment] region for this OSDU resource object.

ResourceHostRegionIDs.description: The name of the host [cloud environment] region(s) for this OSDU resource object.

ResourceObjectCreationDateTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which Version 1 of this OSDU resource object was originated.

ResourceVersionCreationDateTime.description: Timestamp of the time when the current version of this resource entered the OSDU.

ResourceCurationStatus.description: Describes the current Curation status. Possible values - CREATED, CURATING, CURATED.

ResourceLifecycleStatus.description: Describes the current Resource Lifecycle status. Possible values - LOADING, RECIEVED, ACCEPTED, RESCINDED, DELETED,

ResourceSecurityClassification.description: Classifies the security level of the resourcse. Possible values = RESTRICTED, CLASSIFIED, CONFIDENTIAL, MOST CONFIDENTIAL

LogCurveMainFamilyName.description: Textual name , could be abbreviated or a mnemonic if a fully spelled name is not present or needed , mandatory.

LogCurveMainFamilyNameAlias.description: Alternative names, including historical, by which this entity instance is/has been known.

LogCurveMainFamilyID.description: The unique identifier of an Item Type.

InactiveIndicator.description: This is set to T (True) if the instance is no longer in use.

LogCurveMainFamilyDescription.description: Plain English text description of the TYPE instance.
